attributes.action: Ban fireworks to the general public, organised displays only
attributes.additional_details: Because its terrifying elderly people, war veterans, pets and wildlife
attributes.background: To control the sale of fireworks to organised displays only

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
